topic.title: Dunkin Donuts
topic.shortdesc: This topic is about a coffee shop at Virginia Tech in Blacksburg named Dunkin Donuts, part of the popular chain of shops.

image.alt: A picture of the exterior of the Dunkin Donuts, with a sign out front reading "Owen's Hall."

section.title: Atmosphere

image.alt: A picture of Dunkin Donuts with people in line to order and the menu's displayed above.

section.p: There is no seating in the immediate area. There is some in the adjacent food court area but it is often quite loud and busy.

section.title: Chai Rating
section.p: Their chai was very milky with little spice.

section.title: Food
section.p: They have a decent variety of food from pastries to sandwiches to wraps. All of which are tasty and priced accordingly. Their donuts especially have gained popularity.

section.title: Overall Rating
section.p: This shop provides a familiar feel to any other Dunkin Donuts shop. They have good food and drinks that don't usually disappoint. There is nothing special about this shop but it is a great place to go to if you want to grab something quick and leave.
